column4: I can compare 10 different linux distros in a flash now... I dont even wanna think about having to installed those by hand
would have taken many days heh
I have to deliver a preliminary report on desktop linux alternatives by monday... as a consultant for a medium sized pc dealer
sorta leaning towards recommending ubuntu... but I dunno...
total newbies and out-of-the-box pc buyers
my job to make a suitable implementation for the company
so that they can sell custom computers shipped with linux :)
I'm considering libranet/xandros/linspire/ubuntu at the moment Gagatan
perhaps I'll just build a custom debian tho...
yep, I'm involved with a LUG in norway... we try to push skolelinux every chance we get ;)
